Articles.Content:
Challenge:

Find and Screenshot Easter Eggs in KSP

 

Rules:

No mods, Spacecraft need to be Stock, No kerbnet, No cheats

 

Difficulty:

Easy=Screenshot Minimal 2 Easter Egg

Medium=Screenshot Minimal 5 Easter Egg

Hard=Screenshot all Easter Eggs in KSP

 

Good luck if anyone wanna do this challenge!
